844880.name: VR-X Player Steam Edition
844880.description:
MAGIX VR-X PLAYER – Steam Edition
MAGIX VR-X PLAYER Steam Edition lets you view all media such as photos, videos and 3D media in a brand new, multidimensional world. Experience recordings right in the middle of the action.Revolutionary: Users don't even require expensive hardware - just a PC or smartphone and a smartphone VR mount. MAGIX VR-X PLAYER Steam Edition offers wide-ranging support for Android, iOS, Windows and Microsoft.And best of all, MAGIX VR-X PLAYER Steam Edition can be downloaded for free and no registration is required!

The essential features:

[/list]
  • Compatible with photos, videos and 3D media
  • No VR hardware required
  • Supports VR mounts for smartphone and professional VR headsets
  • Supports Android, iOS and Windows with Oculus Rift, HTC Vive and Microsoft Mixed Reality.
  • Wireless transfer for projects in Photostory Premium VR to VR-X Player
  • Free and no registration required

MAGIX VR-X Player + Photostory Premium VR

Enter the world of virtual reality

Create your own virtual worlds using Photostory Premium VR Steam Edition and your 360° photos.Design breathtaking virtual spaces and share your images with family and friends in a whole new way or view your new virtual photo gallery for yourself. Photostory Premium VR – Steam Edition combined with MAGIX VR-X PLAYER Steam Edition is the perfect way to display next-generation slideshows: Transfer projects from Photostory Premium VR – Steam Edition to MAGIX VR-X PLAYER Steam Edition and walk right into your own personal virtual world. It's easy and can be done with wireless transfer.Turn your photos into real experiences today!
844880.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
